commands.text:
# you probably don't want to change these!
 # only change them if you're using a server with multiple network interfaces
 endpoint_add_tcp "${ip}:${port}"
 endpoint_add_udp "${ip}:${port}"
 sets tags "${tags}"
  # Load Resources
 exec serverconfiguration-default.cfg
 sv_scriptHookAllowed ${allowscripts}
  # change this
 #rcon_password ChangeMe
  sv_hostname "${servername}"
  # loading a server icon (96x96 PNG file)
 load_server_icon ${servericon}
  # disable announcing? clear out the master by uncommenting this
 #sv_master1 ""
  # want to only allow players authenticated with a third-party provider like Steam?
 #sv_authMaxVariance 1
 #sv_authMinTrust 5
 # add system admins add_ace group.admin command allow
 # allow all commands add_ace group.admin command.quit deny
 # but don't allow quit
 add_principal identifier.steam:110000105204c22 group.admin # xrayhunter
  # hide player endpoints in external log output
 sv_endpointprivacy ${hideendpointipaddress}
# server slots limit (default to 30)
 sv_maxclients ${maxclients}
# Steam Web API key, if you want to use Steam authentication (https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey)
 set steam_webApiKey ${steamWebAPI}          # Get a key from https://keymaster.fivem.net sv_licensekey ${licensekey}

start mapmanager
start chat
start spawnmanager
start sessionmanager
start fivem
start hardcap
start rconlog
start scoreboard
start playernames

ip.desc: What IP to bind the server to

port.desc: What port to bind the server to

gameversion.desc: What game version would you like it to install? (Version List)

licensekey.desc: You need a license key for your server (https://keymaster.fivem.net)

steamWebAPI.desc: Steam Web API key, if you want to use Steam authentication (https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey)

maxclients.desc: How many clients you would like to limit in your server? (32 max)

allowscripts.desc: Should Clients be able to run custom Client-Sides Scripts?

tags.desc: What tags would you like to categorize your server.

servername.desc: What would you like to display to the server list

hideendpointipaddress.desc: This should keep the player's IP Addresses a bit more secure/hidden.

servericon.desc: Where would you like to upload your icon to the server listing. (Locally prefered)
